response.overview: There is a woman who from childhood dreamed of giving birth to healthy children and being a good mother to them. She has become a good mother. And she gave birth to sons. But the youngest was born with a diagnosis of cerebral palsy. So her life turned out: she fulfilled her dream, and the test from fate, from God. Her whole life is now devoted to her son with cerebral palsy Georgy-Zhora. The eldest son helps his mother whenever possible. The younger Zhora worries that he has become a burden to the family and is trying to learn self-sufficiency. But it is important for a mother to help her son Zhora. His smile matters. And for her, this is happiness and the fulfillment of her dreams.
response.title: Happiness
